Question: This person's uncle Robert Manning insisted, despite This person's protests, that the boy attend college.
Hints: Nathaniel later added a "w" to make his name "this person" in order to hide this relation.
This person wrote in the comparative obscurity of what he called his "owl's nest" in the family home.
Longfellow wrote a tribute poem to this person, published in 1866, called "The Bells of Lynn".
